rate_limit_id.description: The ID of the rate limit.

max_images_per_1_minute.description: The maximum images per minute. Only relevant for certain models.

max_requests_per_1_day.description: The maximum requests per day. Only relevant for certain models.

batch_1_day_max_input_tokens.description: The maximum batch input tokens per day. Only relevant for certain models.
